scripts.lerna:publish: yarn run prepublishOnly:root && lerna publish && yarn run postpublishOnly
scripts.lerna:publish:yes: yarn run prepublishOnly:root && lerna publish --yes --bump patch && yarn run postpublishOnly
scripts.prepublishOnly:root: yarn run prepublishOnly:check-bin && yarn run prepare:fix-ws-links
scripts.prepublishOnly:update: yarn run ncu && yarn run sort-package-json
scripts.postpublishOnly:ws-root-changelog: ynpx ws-root-changelog & git add ./CHANGELOG.md & git commit ./CHANGELOG.md -m "chore(changelog): update changelog toc in workspaces root" & echo update changelog toc in workspaces root
scripts.ncu: yarn run ncu:root && yarn run ncu:ws
scripts.sort-package-json: yarn run sort-package-json:root && yarn run sort-package-json:ws
